skill.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
skill.description:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Unleash a rapid series of punches that strike enemies for 190% weapon damage as Physical.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Strike groups of enemies with a series of devastating punches.

rune.name: Fists of Fury
rune.description: Perform a short dash with the first attack and enemies hit take an additional 60% weapon damage as Holy over 3 seconds. Fists of Fury damage can stack multiple times on the same enemy.
rune.simpleDescription: Perform a short dash with the first attack and enemies hit take additional Holy damage over a short duration.

skill.name: Lashing Tail Kick
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick that deals 755% weapon damage as Physical.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick that is effective against small groups of enemies.

rune.name: Sweeping Armada
rune.description: Unleash a large roundhouse kick that deals 825% weapon damage as Physical to enemies within 15 yards.
rune.simpleDescription: Unleash a large roundhouse kick that is effective against a large group of enemies.

skill.name: Epiphany
skill.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second by 20 and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Desert Shroud
rune.description: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken by 50%.
rune.simpleDescription: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Blinding Speed
rune.description:
Gain 40% increased chance to Dodge for 4 seconds after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain increased chance to Dodge after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Blinding Flash
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Create a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 3 seconds. Elite enemies recover faster, but suffer a 30% chance to miss with attacks.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Blind all nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

rune.name: Faith in the Light
rune.description: You deal 29% increased damage for 3 seconds after using Blinding Flash.
rune.simpleDescription: You deal increased damage for a short duration after using Blinding Flash.

skill.name: Sweeping Wind
skill.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex that continuously deals 105% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards. The vortex lasts 6 seconds and is refreshed each time you strike an enemy with a melee attack. Landing a Critical Hit has a chance to increase the vortex effect up to 3 stacks for a total of 315% weapon damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex for 6 seconds that damages nearby enemies. Critical Hits intensify the vortex.

rune.name: Inner Storm
rune.description:
As long as your vortex is at 3 or more stacks, you gain 8 Spirit per second.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Holy.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain Spirit whenever the vortex is at 3 or more stacks.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Holy.

skill.name: Harmony
skill.description: 40% of your single elemental resistances from items instead increases your resistance to all elements.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

skill.name: Seize the Initiative
skill.description: Dealing damage to enemies above 75% Life increases your attack speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
skill.flavor: The Monks of Ivgorod are trained to move like water — flowing freely into open spaces and crashing hard against their foes.

skill.name: Near Death Experience
skill.description:
When receiving fatal damage, you instead restore 35% Life and 35% Spirit and are immune to damage and control impairing effects for 2 seconds.

This effect may occur once every 60 seconds.
skill.flavor: "We do not see what has been done, we only see what remains to be done." —Mantra of the Monks of Ivgorod

skill.name: Beacon of Ytar
skill.description: Reduce all cooldowns by 20%.
skill.flavor: It is only through hardship that we come to know our limits, and only through knowing our limits that we learn to shatter them.

mainHand.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Intervene
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Taunt enemies within 10 yards of you for 3 seconds when you are hit.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Taunt enemies near you when you are hit.

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 6437 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Guardian
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Rush to your aid, knocking back enemies within 15 yards and healing you for 182383 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

When your Life is low, the Templar will come to your aid, knocking back nearby enemies and healing you.

skill.name: Crippling Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 140% weapon damage and slows enemies hit by 80% for 4 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that slows enemies.

skill.name: Dirty Fighting
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel.

skill.name: Multishot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Active: The Scoundrel will shoot 3 bolts, each dealing 110% weapon damage.

Passive: The Scoundrel's special attacks have a 50% chance to fire 3 bolts.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Active: The Scoundrel will shoot multiple bolts at once.

Passive: The Scoundrel's special attacks have a chance to fire multiple bolts.

skill.name: Anatomy
skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1.8% for you and the Scoundrel.
skill.simpleDescription: Increases Critical Hit Chance for you and the Scoundrel.

mainHand.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Charm
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Temporarily Charms an enemy to fight for you.

skill.name: Powered Armor
skill.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, increasing Armor by 3% and slowing melee attackers by 60% for 1 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Increases Armor and slows melee attackers for you and the Enchantress.

skill.name: Erosion
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals 330% weapon damage as Arcane over 5 seconds. Affected enemies will also take 3% increased damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals damage and causes affected enemies to take additional damage.

skill.name: Focused Mind
skill.description: A 40 yard aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress by 3%.
skill.simpleDescription: An aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress.
